name: TrainFinder
0:
”Alexa, open Train Finder”
”Alexa, ask Train Finder to set Tel Aviv Savidor as home station”
”Alexa, ask Train Finder for trains from Tel Aviv Savidor to Nahariyya at 8 am”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: train finder
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get Israel Railways train times instantly.

FEATURES:
-------------------
* Home/Work Station - Set home/work station simply by saying something “Alexa, ask Train Finder to set Natanya as my home station”. 
Once both home and work stations are set, you'll be able to ask for trains to work or back home. For example “Alexa, ask Train Finder when is the next train to work”.
You can always change your home/work stations by repeating the ‘set’ command.

* Query trains - Ask for the next train/s times between 2 stations. For example: “Alexa, ask Train Finder for trains from Tel Aviv Savidor to Hertzeliya”
You can also ask for a specific time: “Alexa, ask Train Finder for trains from Tel Aviv Savidor to Hertzeliya at 16:00”
Get trains for tomorrow: “Alexa, ask Train Finder for trains from Tel Aviv University to Haifa Merkaz tomorrow at 16:00”
* Help - you can ask for help at any time. 

* Asking for ‘train from a to b’ will result in a single train while asking for ‘trains’ will result in multiple trains response.

NOTES:
-------------------
* The app relies on information provided by Israel Railways.
* The trains times are only scheduled times. Delays are currently not reported.

BUGS & ISSUES:
-------------------
If you notice any bugs or something isn’t working the way you think it should, please email me at trainfinder@lowenhardt.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
